Stock Market Performance:ONGC stock was trading at â‚¹239.73, up 0.76% from its previous close. ONGC shares also saw unusual trading volumes around this time.

Expansion & Downstream Diversification:ONGC was reportedly negotiating with Mitsui & Co. to form a joint venture to build and operate very large ethane carriers to transport feedstock for their petrochemicals subsidiary OPaL. This aligns with ONGC's push into downstream activities like petrochemicals.

Operational Developments:

ONGC had commissioned its first onshore Multiphase Pumping (MPP) System at the Ahmedabad Asset on April 28, 2025.

The company was also making efforts to restart the Area 1 LNG project in Mozambique, which had been hampered by security challenges. They also sought shareholder approval for financial transactions related to their Mozambique operations.

Analyst Recommendations:Some analysts in May 2025 projected an upside of up to 50% in ONGC shares following their Q4 FY25 earnings report.

Financial Performance:

ONGC announced a dividend of Rs 1.25 per share on May 21, 2025, with a record date of September 4, 2025.

For the year ending March 31, 2025, the company spent 2.37% of its operating revenues on interest expenses and 1.19% on employee costs.
